mainText: We give thanks for a visionary who cared about the reason and the person about for whom his creative mind  cared.  He has done wondrous things to bring the future into the present for all people of the world. His legacy: provision of platforms for the creativity of all minds, young and old, infirm and healthy, to come to fruition. May your soul which has touched our souls rest in peace while the gifts of your mind live forever.
author: Christopher
